subject: Swimming
lead_paragraph: The Netherlands set a world record in the women’s 4x100-meter freestyle relay at the European swimming championships with a time of 3 minutes 33.62 seconds.The Dutch team of Inge Dekker, Ranomi Kromowidjojo, Femke Heemskerk and Marleen Veldhuis led throughout in front of a raucous home crowd in Eindhoven, easily beating the old mark of 3:35.22 set two years ago by Germany.
